welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kolding, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer. Have a wonderful time in Kolding!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maamigili Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vojens Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Vojens Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Billund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Billund Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
